directives.details: State intent, scope, risks, rollback; include Order 025 metadata (owner/timestamp/approvals).
Produce canary_batch_b1.csv/json with build_info.json and .sha256; record counts.
Produce canary_batch_b2.csv/json with build_info.json and .sha256; record counts.
Send to exchange/reports/inbox/order-2025-10-15-030-report.json with per-batch paths, counts, checksums, confirmed schema, DQ results, retention=7d, rollback plan.

summary: Expand canary: emit 2 additional distinct batches as separate files, each with build_info and SHA256; include retention and rollback.
